name: e:racer
description:
Created for #TOJam 2016: Don't Stop bELEVEN

WARNING: DEVELOPMENT BUILD

Assembled together in a weekend, buggy.

Controls:

P1: WSAD - LEFT/RIGHT Accelerate/Slam

R - Respawn

Left Shift - Jump

F2 - Start

F1 - Restart

P2: IKJL - LEFT/RIGHT Accelerate/Slam

P - Respawn

Right Shift - Jump

or XboxOne controllers.. (anti-micro [mappings] already bundled with game)

Made with Blender3D 2.77 Game Engine
first alpha release.. more fixes, features, etc..
